browser_navigate.preservation_instruction: Preserve page title, main navigation elements, key content sections, and any error messages or status indicators. Maintain page structure and navigation elements. Keep element IDs and selectors for interaction.

browser_navigate_back.preservation_instruction: Preserve page title, main navigation elements, key content sections, and any error messages or status indicators. Maintain page structure and navigation elements. Keep element IDs and selectors for interaction.

browser_network_requests.preservation_instruction: Preserve request/response status codes, key headers, error messages, and essential response data. Compress verbose JSON responses while keeping structure.

browser_click.preservation_instruction: Preserve click results, any page changes, error messages, navigation that occurred, and current page state after the click. Include any new elements that appeared or disappeared. Maintain page structure and navigation elements. Keep element IDs and selectors for interaction.
